law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 67, effective July 13, 1990. -- Reenacted 1979 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 1, effective January 1, 1979.

metadata.former-history: Repealed 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 105, effective January 1, 1979. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 1. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(2), (3). -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 196, sec. 1.
